extracted-table.table-caption: Abnormal functional connectivity of the bilateral red nucleus in patients with MwoA compared with healthy controls

caption.p: Abnormal functional connectivity of the bilateral red nucleus in patients with MwoA compared with healthy controls

table-wrap-foot.p: Significance was determined at a voxel-level threshold (P < 0.01) with Gaussian random field theory correction at a cluster-level threshold (two-tailed, P < 0.05). MwoA Migraine without aura, MNI Montreal Neurological Institute
